languages.text: {n}Маражай в отвращении морщит нос.{/n} "Я чувствовал бы вонь этой чудовищной кислятины даже с орбиты. Не оскорбляй меня намеком, что я могу захотеть это пить".
{n}Marazhai wrinkles his nose in disgust.{/n} "I could smell the reek of this awful slosh from orbit. Do not insult me with the suggestion that I might want to drink it."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай в отвращении морщит нос.{/n} "Я чувствовал бы вонь этой чудовищной кислятины даже с орбиты. Не оскорбляй меня намеком, что я могу захотеть это пить".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋厌恶地皱起了鼻子。{/n}“这种臭气熏天的东西，哪怕是在星轨上都能闻得到。不要暗示我喝这种东西，这是对我的侮辱。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai wrinkles his nose in disgust.{/n} "I could smell the reek of this awful slosh from orbit. Do not insult me with the suggestion that I might want to drink it."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋厌恶地皱起了鼻子。{/n}“这种臭气熏天的东西，哪怕是在星轨上都能闻得到。不要暗示我喝这种东西，这是对我的侮辱。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは嫌悪感に顔をしかめ、鼻をひくつかせた。{/n}「このひどい泥水の悪臭は、軌道からでも嗅ぎ取れたぞ。こんなものを飲みたいなどと、侮辱するのはやめてもらおう」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai wrinkles his nose in disgust.{/n} "I could smell the reek of this awful slosh from orbit. Do not insult me with the suggestion that I might want to drink it."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは嫌悪感に顔をしかめ、鼻をひくつかせた。{/n}「このひどい泥水の悪臭は、軌道からでも嗅ぎ取れたぞ。こんなものを飲みたいなどと、侮辱するのはやめてもらおう」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai arruga la nariz, asqueado.{/n} «La fetidez de este repugnante bebedizo se olía desde la órbita. No me insultes insinuando que podría querer probarlo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai wrinkles his nose in disgust.{/n} "I could smell the reek of this awful slosh from orbit. Do not insult me with the suggestion that I might want to drink it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai arruga la nariz, asqueado.{/n} «La fetidez de este repugnante bebedizo se olía desde la órbita. No me insultes insinuando que podría querer probarlo».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, iğrenerek burun kıvırıyor.{/n} "Bu berbat çalkantının kokusunu ta yörüngeden almıştım. Bunu içmek isteyebileceğimi öne sürerek bana hakaret etme."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai wrinkles his nose in disgust.{/n} "I could smell the reek of this awful slosh from orbit. Do not insult me with the suggestion that I might want to drink it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, iğrenerek burun kıvırıyor.{/n} "Bu berbat çalkantının kokusunu ta yörüngeden almıştım. Bunu içmek isteyebileceğimi öne sürerek bana hakaret etme."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fronce le nez de dégoût.{/n} « J'ai senti les relents de cet infâme breuvage depuis l'orbite. Ne m'insultez pas en suggérant que je pourrais vouloir en boire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai wrinkles his nose in disgust.{/n} "I could smell the reek of this awful slosh from orbit. Do not insult me with the suggestion that I might want to drink it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fronce le nez de dégoût.{/n} « J'ai senti les relents de cet infâme breuvage depuis l'orbite. Ne m'insultez pas en suggérant que je pourrais vouloir en boire. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai rümpft angewidert die Nase.{/n} "Ich konnte diesen schrecklichen Fusel schon aus dem Orbit riechen. Beleidigt mich nicht mit der Annahme, ich wolle ihn trinken."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai wrinkles his nose in disgust.{/n} "I could smell the reek of this awful slosh from orbit. Do not insult me with the suggestion that I might want to drink it."
